sentences.en: " No mistake about it, " answered the young man in the baggy trousers.
sentences.cn: “ 错不了! " 是腊肠式裤管的青年回答.

sentences.en: At the moment, he was wearing an MIt'sweatshirt and baggy shorts.
sentences.cn: 今天, 他穿着麻省理工学院又短又松的汗衫.

sentences.en: Baggy clothes became popular among the youth in the 1990 s.
sentences.cn: 宽大松垮的衣服于90年代在青年中流行起来.

sentences.en: Baggy pants are meant to be stylish, not offensive.
sentences.cn: 松松垮垮的裤子意味着时髦, 而不是无礼.

sentences.en: Certainly , the baggy trousers can't be taken too seriously.
sentences.cn: 因此, 不要对穿着宽大拖沓的裤子太过于认真了哦.

sentences.en: Graham was standing there, his hands dug into the pockets of his baggy white trousers.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆站在那里，双手插在宽松的白色裤子的兜里。

sentences.en: He began to search in the right - hand pocket of his well - worn and baggy linen suit.
sentences.cn: 他开始在那件磨得很旧的,肥大的衣服上的右边口袋里东摸西摸.

sentences.en: He was wearing a stripy shirt and baggy blue trousers.
sentences.cn: 他身着一件条纹衬衫和一条宽松的蓝裤子。

sentences.en: My T - shirt went all baggy in the wash.
sentences.cn: 我的 T 恤越洗越大了.

sentences.en: She dresses down in baggy clothes to avoid hordes of admirers.
sentences.cn: 她随便穿了件宽松的衣服以免被大批的粉丝认出。

sentences.en: She is wearing tight, black leggings and a baggy green jersey.
sentences.cn: 她身穿黑色紧身裤和一件宽松的绿色针织套衫。

sentences.en: She was wearing jeans and a baggy T-shirt.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一条牛仔裤和一件宽松的T恤衫。

sentences.en: The color is the same, but these are more baggy.
sentences.cn: 颜色是相同, 但这些比较宽松.

sentences.en: The style includes baggy jeans, sweatshirts, hiking boots, and baseball caps.
sentences.cn: 这种风格包括乞丐裤, 运动衫, 登山靴和棒球帽.

sentences.en: They were sick eyes, fever bright, and dark baggy circles were beneath them.
sentences.cn: 这双眼睛显然不对头,火亮火亮的, 下面各有一道弯曲的黑影.

sentences.en: Yes, I'd like to exchange a pair of jeans - baggy with faded colors.
sentences.cn: 是的, 我想换一条牛仔裤 —— 肥大而且褪色.

words.tran_cn: 袋；猎获物；（俚）一瓶啤酒；vt. 猎获；把…装入袋中；占据，私吞；使膨大；vi. 松垂
袋状的，膨胀的；宽松而下垂的

trans.tran_en: baggy clothes are big and do not fit tightly on your body
